issues.title: Create S3 bucket
issues.description: We need an S3 bucket to store data. The bucket name should be CBA
comments: How do I login to AWS to create the bucket?
Use this AWS access key: AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE. The secret can be found on vault

issues.title: Update Ubuntu packages on backend server
